ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying in the Sakyan country at Kapilavatthu in the Banyan Tree Monastery.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.2_0: the monks from the group of six went to the nuns’ dwelling place and instructed the nuns from the group of six.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.3_0: Soon afterwards other nuns said to those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.4_0: “Come, Venerables, let’s go to the instruction.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.5_0: “There’s no need. The monks from the group of six came and instructed us right here.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.7_0: “How can the nuns from the group of six not go to the instruction?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns didn’t do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.11_0: “... How can the nuns from the group of six not go to the instruction?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.13_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun does not go to the instruction or take part in a formal meeting of the community, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.1.8_0: joint legal procedures, a joint recitation, the same training.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.1.9_0: If she thinks, “I won’t go to the instruction or take part in a formal meeting of the community,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.2.3_0: if she searches for a companion nun, but does not find one;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.2.7_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.2.8_0: The eighth training rule is finished.
